I've read so many great reviews about this place but sadly, I was very disappointed.  We went mid-day and ordered hot tapas straight off the menu (rather than getting what was there along the bar ready to go).  I had hoped it would be better since the items we requested were made to order.  The bacon covered dates were overcooked, to the point that they actually taste burnt.  The shrimp was the only semi-decent dish.  Nothing else was memorable or worth noting.The only reason I give this place 2 stars is because the waiters were very nice.  Unfortunately the food didn't cut it at all though.  Maybe there was so much hype they don't feel the need to invest as much into their food now?  Who knows :(
